articles.author: Nick Dole
articles.title: Ukrainians contemplate a heartbreaking decision amid fears of conflict with Russia: stay or leave - ABC News
articles.description: Despite the looming threat of conflict, life in Ukraine’s capital Kyiv resembles that of any major European city. But behind the scenes, for many the potential of a Russian attack is never far from their minds.
articles.content:
In their apartment in suburban Kyiv, Nadiia Khmel and her son Dymytro Humeniuk are preparing for an attack they hope never comes. 
Dymytro, 26, is packing a camouflaged bag with combat gear, some of… [+5229 chars]

articles.title: Russia invading Ukraine 'set for 3am tomorrow' with air strikes and tanks ready - Irish Mirror
articles.description: Europe could be just a few hours from all-out war in Ukraine despite last ditch diplomatic moves
articles.content:
